topics.body:
Ok, my internet problems seem to be fixed. Somehow. Again. What the fcuk

In other news, my dad snuck into my room while I was at school and tried to "fix" the hinge on my laptop. Now I can't even close it. His fix is literally putting a binder clip on the screen to keep it stable, and he re-attached the hinge, but now it won't close right without making an awful snapping sound every time I try.

So basically he made me hate this laptop even more, which I didn't think was possible. I tried un-doing his "fix," but I couldn't without everything almost falling apart. My laptop is on its last stretch of life, one wrong move and I'll need a replacement.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200
